name: Gamnetic
description:
In this game you have only 90 seconds to get Tiny Red Balls to the Red Cube, and Tiny Blue Balls to the Blue Cube. Every ball that got you to it's cube will score you a point.

You will use magnetic towers in order to move the balls. Red balls gravitate towards the Blue Tower, and are repelled from the Red Tower. Blue balls gravitate towards the Red Tower, and are repelled from the Blue Tower. Just like magnets!

Be aware of the green portals! If a ball gets near it, it will be swallowed by the portal. This will not give you any points.

Whoever drives the most balls to they're cube wins.
